Beware: Addiction ahead

If you got 2-3 friends to play with this game is just awesome. Clutches and lucky shots will make you fall in love with this game. Regular updates, new maps and events will keep you engaged. And yes, some awesome skins <3

Only problem is the anti cheat firewall of this game. Most of the high rank holders are cheating in the game. Hacks are very very common in non prime games and in prime games people will trigger if they start losing. Steam is barely working on it's anti cheat policy for this game as I have seen people using hacks blatantly for months and not getting banned.

Meri Ek taang nakli hai, Mai hockey ka bohoth bada khiladi tha.
Ek din Uday bhai ko meri kisi baat pe gussa aagaya aur mere he hockey se meri taang ke do tukde kar diye.
Lekin dil ke bohot ache hai, Fauran mujhe hospital le gaye aur ye nakli taang lagwayi.
